text: Had a lovely facial at Ikigai Wellness Clinic Singapore! The space is calm and welcoming, and the therapist was gentle, attentive, and professional. My skin felt super refreshed and glowing afterward. Highly recommend for anyone looking to treat themselves or improve their skin health.
